releaseNotes:
v2.7
 - Implemented system-less installation mode if normal mode is unavailable (experimental).
 - App now targets targets SDK 31.
 - Implemented crash reporting.
 - Added French, Polish, and Vietnamese translations.
 - Updated build tools and dependencies.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.6
 - Added Chinese (TW) and Croatian (incomplete) translations.
 - Updated build tools and dependencies.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.5
 - App doesn't need storage access permission anymore.
 - Added Spanish, Turkish, Burmese and Arabic translations.
 - Updated Gradle plugin & build tools.
 - Internal updates.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.4
 - Restore separate binary for armv7l architecture.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.3
 - Updated to BusyBox v1.32.1.
 - Re-designed App theme and About page.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.2
 - Improved language switch.
 - Added Czech translations.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.1
 - Updates for latest Android versions.
 - App will now show a supporter badge for those who donated.
 - Updated Korean and Indonesian translations.
 - Added link to POEditor localization service to About menu.
 - Fixed possible crashes.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v2.0
 - Added support to armv8l architectures (need more testing).
 - App is now completely Ad-frees.
 - App will now follow the system themes.
 - Added a donation option (Settings --> About).
 - Merged About & Change-logs menus.
 - Added custom progress dialogue for BusyBox installation and removing processes.
 - Added Indonesian translations.
 - Replaced toast messages with SnackBars.
 - App now uses material elements as much as possibles.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v1.9
 - Added auto app theme mode.
 - Updated Ad layout.
 - Updated build tools.

v1.8
 - Updated libsu to v3.0.2.
 - Updated translations, build tools and dependencies.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v1.7
 - Fixed crashes on clicking install/update button (sorry for that).
 - Slightly improved layout.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v1.6
 - Implemented Brand New About view.
 - Added change-logs to setting menu.
 - Added language switch.
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v1.5
 - Improve Root handling.
 - Improved App UI.
 - Move top icons into a new Settings Menu.
 - Misc: Replace some toasts with snackbar.
 - Updated Portugease (Brazilian) (Credits @Lennoard) & Korean (Credits: @SmgKhOaRn) translations.

v1.4
 - Migrated to libsu (Credits: @Lennoard ).
 - Largely improved BusyBox installation and removing process (Should work on most devices).
 - Updated Portuguese (Brazilian) translations (Credits: @Lennoard ).
 - Miscellaneous changes.

v1.3
 - Added Greek translations (Credits: @tsiflimagas)
 - Replaced Paypal donation link with Donation app (to staisfy google)

v1.2
 - Added option to remove BusyBox applets installed from the app.
 - Show installed applets list on long-clicking BusyBox image.
 - Show installed BusyBox version on long-clicking info icon.
 - Improved APP UI and coding quality (Credits: @Lennoard ).
 - Added share app & donation buttons.
 - Added Brazilian Portuguese (Credits: @Lennoard ), Amharic (Credits: @Mikesew1320 ) and Russian (Credits: @Mikesew1320 ) translations.
 - Improved Korean translations (Credits: @SmgKhOaRn )
 - Miscellaneous changes

v1.1
 - Added Korean translations (Credits: @SmgKhOaRn)
 - Updated instalaltion success check

v1.0
 - Initial release.
